description: A collection of circles in a parallelogram-shaped formation with rounded corners; there is also a circular formation connected to the top of the parallelogram-shaped formation. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a small, thin green triangle toward the top right of the circular formation and a larger green triangle in the center of the parallelogram-shaped formation.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
